title: Woman tourist r@ped in Goa by a man she met on flight.
selftext:
Uncles are more creepy.

Let's not blame the woman for the early trust. It's not an excuse for anyone to rape. In fact we must make an environment where woman can actually trust someone. 

It's so easy to comment "Why did she even share her number", "Why did she vist him alone". It's NOT the excuse to rape someone. One could also ask, "Why he took advantage of her and raped her".
comments:
इन नीच राक्षसों की वजह से..

एक समय आएगा जब भारत में लोग बाहर से आना बंद कर देंगे ॥
